content: 800, 000 illegal voters were discovered by a non-partisan study. Nice try though: Hillary Clinton received 800,000 votes from noncitizens, bolsters Trump argument, study findsHillary Clinton garnered more than 800,000 votes from noncitizens on Nov. 8, an approximation far short of President…m.washingtontimes.com Who knows how many more will be discovered once the DoJ gets involved.
